sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef, useState, useEffect } from "react"; const Contact = () => { const form = useRef(); const [isSent, setIsSent] = useState(false); const [error, setError] = useState(""); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { let timeout; if (error) { timeout = setTimeout(() => { setError(""); }, 8000); } return () => clearTimeout(timeout); }, [error]); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsLoading(true); const formData = new FormData(form.current); const data = {}; formData.forEach((value, key) => { data[key] = value; }); try { const response = await fetch( "https://dental-clinic-twpc.onrender.com/send-email", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(data), } ); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error("Something went wrong! Please try again."); } setIsSent(true); form.current.reset(); setTimeout(() => { setIsSent(false); }, 5000); } catch (err) { setError(err.message); } finally { setIsLoading(false); } }; return (

Contact

Get In Touch

Book an appointment with our doctor, we are ready and waiting to serve you.

Clinic Hours

Monday - Saturday

    Morning:{" "} 10:00 - 02:00

    Evening : 05:00 - 09:00

Sunday : Closed

+91 9730031147

gurunanakdental.apt@gmail.com

{isSent && (

Your message has been sent successfully!

)} {error &&

{error}

}
); }; export default Contact;
